Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameHandler
public class GameHandler extends Object
GameHandler class handles a single match, instantiating a Game and a main GameManager.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameHandler

      public GameHandler(Server server)
      Constructor GameHandler creates a new GameHandler instance.
      Parameters:
      server - the main server instance.

  • Method Details

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer(String nickname, int playerID)
      Method createPlayer calls the Model player creator when a new player joins a game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name chosen by the joining player.
      playerID - the ID that the server has given to him.

    • reEnterPlayer

      public void reEnterPlayer(String nickname)
      Method reEnterPlay lets a player join a game that he has previously left.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player that has joined.

    • reEnterWaitingPlayers

      public void reEnterWaitingPlayers()
      Method reEnterWaitingPlayers adds player that have reconnected to the game in order for the game to continue.

    • sendAll

      public void sendAll(Answer message)
      Method sendAll sends an incoming packaged message to all the clients connected to the game.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to forward to all the players.

    • sendAllExcept

      public void sendAllExcept(Answer message, int excludedID)
      Method sendAllExcept sends an incoming packaged message to all the clients connected to the game, except the excluded one.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to forward to all but one player.

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber(int number)
      Method setPlayersNumber assigns the game's player number (decided at the game setup phase).
      Parameters:
      number - the player number to set.

    • setExpertMode

      public void setExpertMode(boolean expert)
      Method setExpertMode assigns the game's game (decided at the game setup phase).
      Parameters:
      expert - the flag that represents if a game is to be to the normal or expert game mode.

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Method isStarted checks if a game has started.
      Returns:
      true if the game has started, false otherwise.

    • isEnded

      public boolean isEnded()
      Method isEnded checks if a game has ended.
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise.

    • isSetupPhase

      public boolean isSetupPhase()
      Method isSetupPhase checks if a game is currently in the setup phase.
      Returns:
      true if the game is the setup phase, false otherwise.

    • getActivePlayers

      public List<Player> getActivePlayers()
      Method getActivePlayers returns the list of players currently connected to the game.
      Returns:
      The list of players connected to the game.

    • setEnded

      public void setEnded()
      Method setEnded ends a currently not ended game to the ended status.

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws InterruptedException
      Method startGame initializes the main controller class, which in turn initializes the model class. This method is needed for a game to begin.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Method endGame sets a game to the ended status, terminating connections to all the connected clients. This method is needed for a game to end.

    • endGame

      public void endGame(String leftNickname)
      Method endGame sets a game to the ended status, terminating connections to all the connected clients. This method represents when a player leaves in the setup phase. Other disconnection is handled differently.
      Parameters:
      leftNickname - the name of the player that has left.
      See Also:
      • reEnterPlayer(String)

    • unregisterPlayer

      public void unregisterPlayer(int id)
      Method unregisterPlayer lets a player leave the game. If the game is set to the setup phase, the game then ends.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the player that is leaving.

    • sendVictory

      public void sendVictory(String player)
      Method sendVictory send the win message to the player that has won, and to the other players that they have lost.
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player that has won.

    • performAction

      public void performAction(Performable action) throws InvalidPlayerException, RoundOwnerException, GameException
      Method performAction calls the homonym method on the controller and executes a given action on the controller.
      Parameters:
      action - of type Performable. The action that needs to be executed.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - if the action's player is not in the current game.
      RoundOwnerException - if the action's player is not the current round owner.
      GameException - if there is no round owner, or you are the only player left in the game (the game is frozen).
